summary: A command‑line utility that trains a NeMo frame‑wise speech classification model. It reads a manifest containing audio paths and per‑frame label strings, applies a configurable Hydra configuration (default 20 ms frames), and supports multi‑GPU distributed training.
business_intent: Provide researchers and engineers with a ready‑to‑use tool for building and training models that assign class labels to short time‑slices of audio, enabling applications such as phoneme detection, sound event tagging, or other fine‑grained speech analysis.
